text: "Where Have All the Good Times Gone" is a 1965 song by British band The Kinks and is the B-side to Till the End of the Day. It was taken from their third studio album The Kink Kontroversy. It has covered by David Bowie and Van Halen for their fifth studio album Diver Down. British band Supergrass covered it live many times from 1997 to 1999. ==References== Category:1965 songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:David Bowie songs Category:Van Halen songs Category:Supergrass songs Category:Garage rock songs
title: Where Have All the Good Times Gone
